form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Feinstein (for herself and Mr. Enzi) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 39, United States Code, to extend the authority of the United States Postal Service to issue a semipostal to raise funds for breast cancer research, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Breast Cancer Research Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2015.

section.header: Extension of postage stamp for breast cancer research
section.text: Section 414(h) of title 39, United States Code, is amended by striking 2015 and inserting 2019.

section.header: Ensuring that funds generated by special postage stamp sales are used for breast cancer research
section.text: Section 414(c)(1) of title 39, United States Code, is amended in the matter following subparagraph (B) by adding at the end the following: An agency that receives amounts from the Postal Service under this paragraph shall use the amounts for breast cancer research..
